sys_script_include.name: BidFormScriptInclude

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6d19b003933e421094e3f15a7bba1084
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.BidFormScriptInclude</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>BidFormScriptInclude</name><script><![CDATA[var BidFormScriptInclude = Class.create();
BidFormScriptInclude.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    validateBidAmount: function(itemSysId, bidAmount) {
        var itemGr = new GlideRecord('item_table'); // Replace 'item_table' with your actual table name
        if (itemGr.get(itemSysId)) {
            var highestBidAmount = itemGr.getValue('highest_bid_amount');
            var startBidAmount = itemGr.getValue('start_bid_amount');

            if (parseFloat(bidAmount) <= parseFloat(highestBidAmount) || parseFloat(bidAmount) <= parseFloat(startBidAmount)) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    },

    type: 'BidFormScriptInclude'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-19 09:12:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d19b003933e421094e3f15a7bba1084</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BidFormScriptInclude</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6d19b003933e421094e3f15a7bba1084</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-19 09:15:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
